bibl.title: Demotic Texts from Qasr Ibrim.
bibl.note: 1. The historical context: Ptolemies, Romans and Meroites in Lower Nubia. - 2. The socio-linguistic context: Demotic in Lower Nubia. - 3. The socio-cultural context: Demotic texts from Qasr Ibrim [gives a new translation of P. dem. Qasr Ibrîm recto and 2 recto.] - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: 145.12 P. dem. Qasr Ibrîm 1 recto; 2 recto
Brian Muhs, Demotic Texts from Qasr Ibrim.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 167-178.

1. The historical context: Ptolemies, Romans and Meroites in Lower Nubia. - 2. The socio-linguistic context: Demotic in Lower Nubia. - 3. The socio-cultural context: Demotic texts from Qasr Ibrim [gives a new translation of P. dem. Qasr Ibrîm recto and 2 recto.] - Conclusions.
